definition[0]: a small organ near your bowel, which has little or no use
example[0]: Christine had to go into hospital to have her appendix out  (=have it removed).
definition[1]: a part at the end of a book containing additional information
definition[2]: a part at the end of a book, document, or report, containing additional or useful information
example[2]: Further details of the 60 films used in this study are given in Appendix 2.
